title: Ring Adapter for Ring Wired Video Doorbells, Din Rail Transformer (2nd Gen)
raw_desc: Hardwire compatible Ring Video Doorbells using your existing doorbell wiring, for non-stop power and protection. Designed specifically for Ring devices. Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell Wired, Ring Video Doorbell Pro and Ring Video Doorbell Pro 2. Not compatible with Ring Chimes. Installation by a qualified electrician recommended.
features: Hardwire compatible Ring Video Doorbells using your existing doorbell wiring, for non-stop power and protection.
Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell Wired, Ring Video Doorbell Pro and Ring Video Doorbell Pro 2.
Installation by a qualified electrician recommended.
